name: Yaybench-p8AI
description: PowerAI-examples (caffe, torch, tensorflow), access Jupyter Notebooks from ports 8888,8889,8890, TensorBoard from port 6006 and DIGITS from port 5000. SSH into instance with user id: nimbix@<fqdn> and password from the Dashboard. Run “sudo su” followed by “jupyter notebook list” to find the tokens to login to the Jupyter notebook servers. The container runs for a max of 2 hours
author: raj@yayworks.com

Server.name: Server
Server.description: Launch a session with all boot services, including SSH.  Connection address and credentials will appear in your web browser once available.
